title: Ticket #5116: Modify collector update parameters
description:
Make TCP the default way to send updates to the collector. But leave UDP as the default when forwarding ads to the view collector.

Work items:

  • Change default for UPDATE_COLLECTOR_WITH_TCP to True
  • Add UPDATE_VIEW_COLLECTOR_WITH_TCP with default False
  • Remove TCP_COLLECTOR_HOST
  • Update defaults for collector to handle large numbers of TCP connections
